name: Cheyenne's Birthday Present!
description:
This was an interesting to work on!

It's a birthday present for a very awesome and amazing person and friend!

Honestly written in less than 4h, I was really super inspired for the short story and kept writing like a crazy person when I first thought of this.

For the record, I would like to state that the entire thing was written and planned around the end of March 2021. This is important for a few reasons:

  • All the spoken dialogue you see were Cheyenne's actual quotes from all over the internet (group chats, private messages, discord servers, wherever we are together basically)
  • Cheyenne decided to commission an artist to make emotes/designs for her twitch/discord. These were revealed in the first days of April and they are the cute pictures you see on the game.
  • The most interesting part of this was that one of the pictures was precisely Oliver the Overlord. Imagine how I felt when suddenly my creation came true without me even telling anyone about it! Had to include the pics in the final version!
  • To add to my absolutely mind-blowing experience of making this, like a week after I finished it, still without knowing its contents, Cheyenne presents another commission:
  • Can you imagine my totally shocked face as I was presented with another perfect match for my story? Look at that Ban Hammer as a weapon and stuff! WTH! It was absolutely incredible the way all of these art commissions she was getting matched everything I wrote. I still can't really believe it!

Overall, just one of the most fun, fastest mind dumps of narrative I ever had and I'll never again be able to match the timing of all these things in such a perfect mini project. Very proud of it! :D
